author: jerenkrantz
msg: * notes/autoversion-compatibility.txt: Add notes on the result of using
mod_dav_lock, mod_dav_svn, and Mac OS X DAV client.  (Linux filesystem
client would probably work now, too.)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: If mod_dav_lock (from httpd-2.1) is available, use it so we can perform
LOCK/UNLOCK operations.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/mod_dav_svn.c:
(dav_svn_provider): Remove constness from dav_svn_provider since we may change
it at run-time if we have a lock implementation.
(register_hooks): If the generic lock API from mod_dav_lock is available, hook
it into dav_svn_provider.locks so that we can use those hooks.

author: blair
msg: * tools/client-side/svn_all_diffs.pl
Add a -log command line option that prints each revision's log
message.
Add more blank lines between each revision's log message and diff to
make the output easier to parse by eye.
(print_revision): New subroutine to print the revision number in a
consistent format.

author: ghudson
msg: Fix "diff -r X:Y" over tunnel agent.  The second session was holding
open the first session's pipes, causing a close of the first session
to hang.
(cleanup_file, ra_svn_open): Set up a child cleanup handler on the
tunnel agent's pipes.
(ra_svn_finish_report, ra_svn_checkout): After calling
svn_ra_svn_drive_editor, some data might be hanging around in the
write buffer in response to the server's close-edit or abort-edit
call.  Flush it so we don't get a double-flush bug from the child
cleanup handler.

author: brane
msg: * INSTALL: Fixed typo.
Suggested by: Mason Thomas <mlt_svn@sbcglobal.net>
